name: Adobe Flex SDK 3.0 (Release)
releaseNotes: Release Notes - Apache Flex - Version Adobe Flex SDK 3.0 (Release)

issues.title: [customer] Adding a double click listener to the divider inside of a DividerBox doesn't seem to work
The close button does not show up when you set showCloseButton at runtime
[customer] [Wish-Flex] In the ClassFactory interface, the newInstance method should have a parameter to allow the factory to decide and further customize the instance
TextInput doesn't show long text
Problem with DateChooser selectedDate
List does not inherit themeColor when set on Application via setStyl
Wrapping - Label and LinkButton
When a Text Components Text is selected and dragged, text scrolls even though all text is displayed
The DownloadProgressBar doesn't appear until the app has finished initializing
Transform Matrix can cause component to be drawn outside of its container
unicode-range in an @font-face rule MUST be quoted it is a single value and not the last option
half rows appearing when sizeToPage is set to true - default true
if horizontalScrollPosition is set to something other than 0, when you open tree node items jump into position
[customer] Drag images sometime not drawn properly
releasing the mouse out of the browser during dragging the dividing line of DividedBox, the state keeps dragging
Blank lines appear on console when running asdoc tool
[customer] An unexpected error occurred when I use asdoc on the desktop within double byte named.
[customer] Datagrid inside tabnavigator with creationPolicy all does not respect the column widths
[External] Firefox: URL in address bar does not update after users modifies URL
Apollo Application cannot set titleIcon
[Adobe Forums] Configuration files using append attribute do not function properly
[Customer] Iris Effect doesn't play correctly when repeated on an Image that changes its source.
The trustContent parameter of loadStyleDeclarations() and loadResourceBundles() does not seem to do anything.
[Flash Player] Player crashes with Ctrl + w if another tab of the TabNavigator has been selected [SDK Tracker]
Embedding a flash symbol with embedded flv data does not work
Setting "horizontalGridLines" to "true" corrupts the row display after variableRowHeight
Too many methods of DateChooser are private
Compiler should fall back to English if it needs l10n resources which are missing from its specified locale. [backwards compatibility]

@see directive with text in front throws indeterminable error

right clicking on datagrid header after initiating column dragging messes up the DG look
Dragging a item visually selects it but does not despatach a change in the selection
DataGrid header rollover/selection behavior can't be easily skinned
dataTipField does not handle XML. [Customer]
Slightly inexact error message with StringValidator's tooLongError.
[customer] Validator.ValidateAll() fails if any validator in array is disabled
[XDomain RSLs] Embedded fonts do not work if the framework is loaded as an RSL
de-selection in DateField and DateChooser is not consistent with other controls
Change getting fired twice when the menu item is selected in the drop down.
[customer] Changing volume and loading a new video, resets the volume to default, but the getter still returns old value.
[customer] @see tag not working correctly

When a DataGrid has a custom itemRenderer and rendererIsEditor=true, then, the reason property of the DataGridEvent is not correct

If you reassign the constraintColumns of an Application and the original ConstraintColumn had minWidth set, you get a RTE
Effects are not playing smoothly or has a Jerk, when applied upon components that has skin privided by Flash as .swc
Checkbox should not dispatch change event when selected property programmatically set [backwards compatibilty]
flex-sdk-description.xml should be saved with unicode encoding, not ansi
[customer] [wish-flex] Adding and removing children from a TabNavigator has a memory leak

move and moving events are not getting fired on mac, when systemChrome is standard.
using bindable with implements IEventDispatcher will cause compiler error
FileSystemTree has redraw issues when toggling showHidden dynamically
binding warning
Selecting a sub node and then closing the parent clears all selection

refreshing Tree collapses opened nodes
ScrollBar getting displaced when the arrow skin is set using Skin States Images.

Container needs to override swapChildrenAt() and maybe also swapChildren()

missing compc -help descriptions
